timestamp.description: Block timestamp in milliseconds specified by the block forger. There can be a time drift up to 30 seconds.

blocksForged.description: Total forged blocks including primary rounds & backup rounds

turnsHit.description: Forged blocks when the delegate is a primary validator

turnsMissed.description: Missed blocks when the delegate is a primary validator

validator.description: Whether the delegate is currently a validator

result.description: The message signature encoded in hexadecimal string

maxTransactionDataSize.description: The maximum transaction size in bytes

minTransactionFee.description: The minimum transaction fee in nano SEM

minDelegateBurnAmount.description: The amount of nano SEM required to burn for delegate registration

timestamp.description: Transaction timestamp in milliseconds specified by the transaction creator. There can be a time drift up to 2 hours.

data.description: Transaction data encoded in hexadecimal string

returnData.description: Return data encoded in hexadecimal string

data.description: Log info data encoded in hexadecimal string

result.description: The composed raw transaction encoded in hexadecimal string
The signed raw transaction encoded in hexadecimal string

startingHeight.description: The block height at which the sync started

info.description: Semux is an experimental high-performance blockchain platform that powers decentralized application.

post.description: Adds a node to node manager.

parameters.name: node
parameters.description: Address of the node in host:port format

post.description: Creates a new account by generating a new private key or importing an existing private key when parameter 'privateKey' is provided.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Assigned alias to the created account.

parameters.name: privateKey
parameters.description: The private key to be imported, create a new key if omitted

post.description: Broadcasts a raw transaction to the network.

parameters.name: raw
parameters.description: Raw transaction encoded in hexadecimal string.

get.description: Compose an unsigned raw transaction then return its hexadecimal encoded string. An unsigned raw transaction can be signed using /sign-raw-transaction API.

parameters.name: network
parameters.description: Network name

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Transaction type

parameters.name: fee
parameters.description: Transaction fee in nano

parameters.name: nonce
parameters.description: Transaction nonce

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: Recipient's address

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: Transaction value in nano SEM

parameters.name: timestamp
parameters.description: Transaction timestamp in milliseconds. Default to current time.

parameters.name: data
parameters.description: Hexadecimal encoded transaction data.

get.description: Sign an unsigned raw transaction then return its hexadecimal encoded string. An unsigned raw transaction can be created using /compose-raw-transaction API.

parameters.name: raw
parameters.description: Unsigned raw transaction encoded in hexadecimal string.

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: Signer's address. This address must exist in the wallet.

200.description: An object about the current sync status
